title: "Loss Prevented"
body: I played my first ranked game of the season this morning as Lux. We lost and in my match history it says loss prevented, but on my provisionals it still has me as 0/1 win/loss ratio

replies.body:
Hey there Lumer,

Could you please [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to Player Support about this issue, they'll be able to assist you further.
